attributes.action: We, the Church Law Campaign Requesting a Statutory Complain Procedures for Handling Complains by Religious Organisations to Handle Complains on Disciplinary Measures and Conduct  & A Special Tribunal to Handle Complains Failed To Resolve Internally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the Church Law Campaign Requesting a Statutory Complain Procedures for handling complains by Religious organisations. We are also seeking a special tribunal to handle complains resulting from the propose statutory complain procedures.
